snippet.textDisplay: A lot of these masks seem like they would hamper your peripheral vision; not a good thing in a firefight.

snippet.textDisplay: A lot of the masks seem like they would block your vision entirely; how are you supposed to see through the Walrus mask?!

snippet.textDisplay: I love this song. Too bad it's during the worst part of the game.

snippet.textDisplay: I heard this game was inspired after the movie " Drive"
snippet.textOriginal: I heard this game was inspired after the movie " Drive"

snippet.textDisplay: Yeah, except I don't remember much. I think the overall theme of the movie was captured whenever youd see him just driving through the night and they'd have those extended camera shots. I can see where the inspiration came from
snippet.textOriginal: Yeah, except I don't remember much. I think the overall theme of the movie was captured whenever youd see him just driving through the night and they'd have those extended camera shots. I can see where the inspiration came from

snippet.textDisplay: It is. Have you seen Drive? One of the best movies I've ever seen.

snippet.textDisplay: I bought the channel back from Facebook, 1 day was enough. As for the remix, I mistyped "4 years of hard work", I meant 4 minutes. Anyways, I find this heavy ambient theme to be one of the better ones in the soundtrack, especially since it plays during a quite memorable moment. The hospital beeping sound is very fitting.
snippet.textOriginal: I bought the channel back from Facebook, 1 day was enough. As for the remix, I mistyped "4 years of hard work", I meant 4 minutes. Anyways, I find this heavy ambient theme to be one of the better ones in the soundtrack, especially since it plays during a quite memorable moment. The hospital beeping sound is very fitting.

snippet.textDisplay: @Eric C. Sure man, send me a link. I'm a video games writer myself, so it would be great to get to know other like-minded writers :)
snippet.textOriginal: @Eric C. Sure man, send me a link. I'm a video games writer myself, so it would be great to get to know other like-minded writers :)

snippet.textDisplay: On this day two years ago, I decided that I really needed to listen to more video game music.  I then chose to write blogs on video game music about a month later, but this day will always hold a special place in my heart.  Thank you once again Gabe for being my inspiration for writing these blogs and I honestly hope that I can make it a career in the future.  As for this song, I really love how ambient it is.  I remember that moment in the game and it was quite a nice song to hear.  Also, I will continue to listen to video game music for a long time as I love listening to all types of video game music.  If anyone is interested in reading them, please let me know and I will provide the link to you.
snippet.textOriginal: On this day two years ago, I decided that I really needed to listen to more video game music. GG Supra, GG.
